016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.log4jsubscriber;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ReactiveStreamsServer;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023import jakarta.inject.Inject;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.*;
025import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
026import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
027import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
028import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
029
030import java.util.Optional;
031
032@Service(name = "log4jsubscriber")
033@RunLevel(6)
034public class Log4jSubscriberService {
035
036    private final Log4jSubscriberConfiguration log4jSubscriberConfiguration;
037
038    @Inject
039    public Log4jSubscriberService(ReactiveStreamsServer reactiveStreams,
040                                  Configuration configuration) {
041        log4jSubscriberConfiguration = new Log4jSubscriberConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("log4jsubscriber"));
042
043        reactiveStreams.subscriber(log4jSubscriberConfiguration.getSubscriberStream(), LogSubscriber::new, LogSubscriber.class);
044    }
045
046    static class LogSubscriber
047            implements Subscriber<WithMetadata<JsonNode>> {
048
049        private final Logger logger;
050        private Subscription subscription;
051
052        public LogSubscriber(Configuration configuration) {
053
054            logger = LogManager.getLogger(configuration.getString("category").orElse(Log4jSubscriberService.class.getName()));
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
059            this.subscription = subscription;
060            subscription.request(512);
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public void onNext(WithMetadata<JsonNode> item) {
065
066            if (item.event().has("loggerName")) {
067                ObjectNode event = (ObjectNode) item.event();
068                Logger eventLogger = LogManager.getLogger(event.get("loggerName").textValue());
069                Level level = Level.getLevel(event.get("level").textValue());
070                Marker marker = Optional.ofNullable(event.path("marker").textValue()).map(MarkerManager::getMarker).orElse(null);
071                String message = event.path("message").textValue();
072                String thrown = null;
073                if (event.has("thrown")) {
074                    JsonNode thrownNode = event.path("thrown");
075                    thrown = thrownNode.path("name").textValue() + ": " + thrownNode.path("message").textValue();
076                    thrown += "\n" + thrownNode.path("extendedStackTrace").textValue();
077                }
078                if (thrown != null) {
079                    message += "\n" + thrown;
080                }
081                ThreadContext.put("log4jsubscriber", Boolean.TRUE.toString());
082                String instanceId = event.path("instanceId").textValue();
083                if (instanceId != null) {
084                    ThreadContext.put("instanceId", instanceId);
085                }
086                eventLogger.log(level, marker, message);
087                ThreadContext.clearMap();
088            } else {
089                logger.info(item.event().toString());
090            }
091
092            subscription.request(1);
093        }
094
095        @Override
096        public void onError(Throwable throwable) {
097            logger.error("Stream error", throwable);
098        }
099
100        @Override
101        public void onComplete() {
102            logger.info("Complete");
103        }
104    }
105}
